headline: Setting the Stage On the Senate Floor
abstract: To make way for a historic impeachment trial, the Senate is undergoing a physical makeover, with custom tables for the prosecutors, cubbies for senators’ phones and quarters for the chief justice.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Twenty-one years ago, Capitol Hill carpenters custom-designed and built a pair of curved tables that could fit in the cramped Senate chamber and serve as work space for the House managers and White House lawyers during the impeachment trial of President Bill Clinton.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
